item.title: Analyzing My Own LinkedIn Data
item.description: Motivation As an active user on LinkedIn with more than 1000 connections, I was curious about the statistics of my network. In particular, I was wondering about these questions: What are the segments of people in my network? Do most of the people in my network work in data science related field? In this blog post, I will go through how I utilized exploratory analysis and data visualizations to answer these questions and gain insights from my own LinkedIn data.
